document_data.name: Suri
document_data.mainbody: '''Suri''' was an [[adventurer]] and [[wererat]] active in [[Waterdeep]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Beneath the City of the Dead|11,19}}
document_data.Description: Suri was a girl with brown hair who wore a silver sun-shaped pendant.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Suri and her sister [[Perdita]] adventured through a secret crypt hidden beneath the [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]]. Misled by fake treasure maps distributed by [[Bregan D'aerthe]], the young sisters reached the lair of [[Artor Morlin]], a powerful [[vampire]]. There, Perdita lost her life and became a [[ghost]], while Suri fought a wererat and subsequently contracted [[lycanthropy]].
